short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds 56 last bookmarks on new tab page. Also it allows to see the list of most popular sites for the last 7 days

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is app for replacing default new tab page. 
One day I decided to add more than default 8 sites to my "new tab" page. Eventually I created this app. 
In addition it displays most popular sites based on last week history
